DOCNAME: CASE OF MUHARREM ASLAN YILDIZ v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

ORG and Highways ( PERSON ) , a ORG body responsible , inter alia , for motorway construction , expropriated CARDINAL plots of land belonging to the applicant in ORG in order to build a motorway . A committee of experts assessed the value of the land and the sum so fixed was paid to him when the expropriation took place .

CARDINAL . Following the applicant ’s request for increased compensation , on CARDINAL DATE ORG of First Instance awarded him additional compensation of MONEY ( TRL ) ( MONEY ( ORG ) ) , plus interest at the statutory rate applicable at the date of the court ’s decision , running from DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of CARDINAL DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the administration paid the applicant TRL CARDINAL ( approximately ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL ) in additional compensation , together with interest .
CARDINAL . On DATE the decision of ORG was served on the applicant .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law and practice are set out in the Aka v. GPE judgment of DATE ( Reports of Judgments and Decisions CARDINAL-VI , § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL ) .
